excerpt: "Because the whole beauty and purpose of the Voice is that it is specifically designed to have no such power. It can provide ideas and insights from the most remote and disadvantaged Indigenous communities to the parliament and government of the day, and the parliament and government has explicit supreme authority to accept or reject such advice."
